
### pointer subterfuge

<pre><code>void f2b(void *arg, size_t len) {
    char buffer[100];
    long val = ...; /* assume on stack */
    long *ptr = ...; /* assume on stack */
    memcpy(buff, arg, len); /* overwrite ptr? */
    <span data-fragment-index="2" class="fragment custom myem-only">*ptr = val</span>; /* arbitrary memory write! */
}
</code></pre>
